entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 10:51 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: SE 32 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:04 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:04 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 except minus 14 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9 except minus 14 inland. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:04 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
